name: OMSI 2: Heuliez Bus Pack - GX x37: Diesel Edition
description: The series of buses from the French bus manufacturer Heuliez finds a continuation in OMSI 2, the Omnibus Simulator, with the GX x37.

name: Pocket Dinosaurs: The Moon Festival Edition
description:
Dinosaurs, land-locked for millions of years, want to escape Earth! However, there is an evil alien in space that seeks to thwart their plans by dropping poisonous dinosaur fruit onto the dinosaur's space tower. Help the dinosaurs escape Earth!
Tilt the device right and left or use touch control to catch falling dinosaurs, aiming to make their tower as high as you can while avoiding the Meteorite, poison fruits and devastating 500-ton wight attack!
Tasty mooncake and special golden mooncake in game to celebrate traditional Chinese holiday The Moon Festival. Don't hesitate to catch them, both them can help your dinosaurs tower build more higher.

name: Piggy Punch: Super Crazy Wacky Runner!
description:
Piggy Punch is the epic tale of a small pig with big dreams. Those dreams however, are interrupted by a band of pilfering farm animals led by the devious Howlett .P. Wolf. Now, armed only with his battle toupe’ and pugilistic powers, its up to our hammy hero to save his candy apple farm and thwart the dastardly plans of his nemesis.
Enjoy the cartoon chaos as players brave through H.P. Wolf’s windy attacks, punching cows, dodging swords, retrieving the stolen candy apples, and much more!

name: Swift Ride
description:
Take a break and get yourself into a swift little ride...
Pass by as many cars as you can without crashing while your speed is gradually increasing. Achieve ranks for score boost,score as many points as you can and get yourself to the top of the Game Center leader-board to challenge your friends.

name: Roadfix Rush
description:
Roadfix Rush is an addictive arcade-style game in which you will have to fix potholes by tapping or sliding your fingers on the screen to avoid cars being crashed.
Being focused and really quick movements will be necessary to achieve the highest score in world-wide leaderboards.

name: Rusher Dominance
description:
Tired of everyday traffic, waiting for the green light at every corner or having to ease off the gas on each turn? Then you desperately need a dose of Rusher Dominance!
Rusher Dominance defines a new concept in street racing. No complex interfaces or long tutorials teaching you how to drive; Rusher is simple to use. Take the device in your hands and try to tame these speed demons! We offer unstoppable fun.

name: Action Ninja Dash
description: Action Ninja Dash

name: Quick Drift
description:
Quick Drift through 25 challenging levels!!
Then Drift the endless roads to see how far you can go!!

name: Crashing Season Run
description:
Grab your steering wheel and prepare to crash!
Crashing Season Run is a one-of-a-kind endless racing game where you steer unstoppable vehicles - endless racing with maximum crashing & fun!
Dodge obstacles and hit enemies to launch them forward to clear your path, and experience stunning low poly styled 3D graphics!

name: Quarto
description:
Quarto is a subtle strategy game with the simplest rules. With more than one million units sold, this abstract game is a masterpiece with worldwide fame.
Each piece has 4 different characteristics that make them unique (color, shape, size, hollow or solid). In every turn, the player selects an available piece for their opponent, who then has to play it by placing it on any empty square on the board… so players don't get choose the pieces they play themselves!
The winner is the first to create a line of 4 pieces with a common characteristic. One of the players will inevitably hand their opponent victory on a plate.

name: Legend of Talisman
description: Elizabeth enjoys collecting ancient relics and stealing from villains precious things. This time she laid her hands on a legendary map of lost pirate treasure. Embark on four discovery missions across 150 locations and help Elizabeth to solve the mystery of the Talisman. Succeed in puzzle solving to get glory and riches or be a shark bait!

name: Doodle Nuke
description:
Full upscale for newer devices, Game Center achievements and leaderboards. Want to see your doodle in an update? Check the in-game news feed for details!
It's not enough to have doodles in a game, sometimes you have to have nukes too. Get revenge on all doodles in Doodle Nuke. Destroy the doodles with nukes! Tap or swipe as many doodles as you can, set off chains of explosions to cause carnage. Each nuke power up sets off another nuke if one's nearby, so create nuclear chain reactions to hike up your score and create a Doodlear Nuclear Meltdown. See if you can chain 10 nukes to trigger Doodle Doomsday. Once the screen gets filled with 100 doodles it's Game Over, so be fast!

name: Lost Colors: World of Secrets
description:
In a distant, mysterious world, there lived unusual inhabitants–creatures who wake up every morning and fill the world with smiles and joy, the reason the world is illuminated with bright colors. One day, the cities of this world began to lose their colors, because some dark force stole the paint from the good inhabitants, who fell asleep and couldn’t give the world a colorful smile any longer.
Help the monsters wake up, paint them.

Pluck living plant-machines from the bushes, move them to the flow of paint, turn yourself so that you can correctly build up the direction of the flow of paint toward the monsters. Build a chain of paint flows through the crystals, which you will need in order to begin to paint the residents of the next city.

name: Jeff Space
description: Guide Jeff through his space adventure and enjoy this entertaining and frenetic shooter style arcade action game. Will you manage to hunt down the evil giant enemies hidden in the mysterious planet?

name: CrashCrafter
description:
Dream it. Craft it. Crash it. Create your own car and compete online against your friends, your enemies, or anyone in the world in a brutal demolition derby!
Feel every smash, bash, and crash as you rip your opponents' cars to shreds. With physics-based damage, everything is destructible!
If you can dream it, you can build it. Every little detail of your build affects the physical performance of your car from speed, to wheel friction, to turning radius.
Create your avatar's face from scratch. Then deck yourself out with collectible outfits!
Team up with your friends in Clan Wars to become world famous drivers!

name: A Block Party!
description:
A Block Party a free puzzle game with simple rules.
The engaging puzzle game with a simple but distinctive gameplay. With it's easy to learn and fun to master gameplay 10x10 columns is the perfect mobile puzzle game.

Drag and drop the colour blocks into the 10x10 board, then clear the blocks by making a line of full bricks horizontally or vertically. This puzzle game ends when you don't have enough space to put a given block into the board. No time limit, no colour match! Fill all the grids with the matching blocks and enjoy this puzzle game! Have fun!!

name: Eternal Mahjong
description:
Eternal Mahjong takes the hugely popular tile-matching game to new heights. Mahjong can be played casually to pass the time or with more focus to sharpen your puzzle solving kills. The game learns your style and adjusts to bring you a fresh challenge with each play.
Play this no-pressure free mahjong game at your own pace. This is a single player Solitaire style mahjong game, also known as Shanghai Mahjongg, Taipei Mah-Jong or Kyodai.

name: Enigma: Tiny Spy
description: Enigma: Point & Click Adventure is a new, atmospheric, completely , point and click adventure game where you have to solve the mystery of Enigma machine and escape from the occupied territory, solving the mind-bending puzzles and riddles, discovering the mysteries and traveling through the Europe as a secret agent during World War 2. The silent age begins! The house is on fire! As a Tiny Spy you’ll have to bring the secret code book using logic, talking, collecting items, solving jigsaws and puzzles. Sometimes you’ll have to be a tiny thief, sometimes dressed up as an enemy soldier. Room escape, important dialogues, hidden objects - all these in one adventure game for boys and girls! Tiny Spy Adventure is specifically designed for pocket / mobile devices so you’ll flow through the game with no frustrations and hiccups.

name: 8-Bit Adventures 1+2 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Seven Heroes
description: Seven Heroes is a simulation card game with each round averagely taking 1-3 min, competing for speed and -comprehensively testing the strategy formulation capability and the calculation competence of players.

name: Shopping Talent
description: Over 100 challenging levels! Show up your wisdom!

name: Beamed 2
description:
Beamed 2 is a grid based puzzle game based upon simple principles of optics. Each puzzle includes up to three laser beams in colors red, green and blue. Drag and drop mirrors, beamsplitters and prisms onto the grid to blend, split and reflect beams onto Jewels of seven colors in order to make them sparkle.
When every Jewel is sparkling the puzzle is solved!

name: Pit Stop Challenge
description: Test your skills by hitting lug nuts, changing tires, using the jack, and filling the gas tank! We have the fastest pit crews on pit road, see if you can beat their fast time.

name: Voyager
description: Voyager is a game for iPhone and iPad that is made with needle felted wool and stop-motion animated. You feel as though you are floating through a dream. Zoom through space! Avoid planes, satellites, asteroids, planets and unexpected creatures lurking in the darkest depths of this galaxy and beyond. Tilt to control. Press and hold the screen to slow down time, and help get yourself through even the trickiest of asteroid belts.

name: Starry Fly
description: Fly through the night with Starry in this fun and enchanting game. Use her magic wand to collect colourful stars on the way and see just how far you can go. Watch out for night creatures lurking in the shadows!

name: Overtaking
description:
Pass 300 cars to try for the best time possible!
Upgrade your cars, unlock new cars, and challenge the players all around the world!

name: Air Wings Intergalactic
description:
Air Wings Intergalactic is a multiplayer game where you pilot various spacecraft, and battle against other online players from around the world. It is simply the best multiplayer game for iOS! The action and excitement is incredible!
There are 7 different ships to choose from, and 13 different levels to battle in. There are 6 different types of weapons that your ships can fire ranging from heat seeking missiles, to laser beams, to magnetic mines.

name: Demon's Rise
description:
Form a mercenary party of adventurers, sell swords, rogue sorcerers and assassins and enlist with an army of Dwarves trying to retake their ancient homeland. Fight in a brutal campaign against goblins, undead, ratmen and the demon lords they worship.
Demon's Rise is a turn-based tactical game where players must lead a party of six heroes through the bowels of an underground city. Battles are intense affairs where the proper use of terrain and cover is as important as the choice of spell or attack.

name: Drive Jump: Offroad Insanity
description:
Drive Jump is an offroad driving game with shooting capabilities to go through each challenge along the way. This driving game is derived from real physics, so do not fall from moving platforms, pitfalls, trampolines, ramps, and many others. There are also hidden worlds where you can collect coins from. Push through obstacles to fill holes and resolve challenges.
It's challenging and puzzling at some instances, but it has insanely addictive gameplay with 4 different worlds to choose from. Become a legendary offload driver, race hard or go home. Jump over ramps and fly over variety of obstacles to take to the next level.

name: Motocross Wheelie King
description:
Race through the desert and do as many wheelies as you can until the wheels of your motocross fall off. Tap and hold the screen to do a wheelie and release to lower. Just don't let your front wheel touch the ground!
Addictive one tap endless racing action with 10 different bikes to unlock. Every Motocross has its special abilities. Unlock them all and be the King of the Wheelie. Compete with your friends and the world on the Game Center leaderboard. Share your score and brag to your friends!

name: Superhoops Basketball 2016
description: Amazing basketball game, stunning 3D graphics, addictive game play and basketball action like you never seen before. This basketball game has pushed the limits for mobile gaming everything from gameplay, graphics and effects feels and looks awesome.

name: Farmula Grain Prix
description: Harvest Racing

name: Skullboy Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Gods From the Abyss
description: An horror beat'em up set in an eldritch-Lovecraftian world.

name: Fighting Pudding
description: [2D] Avoid, block, and destroy! Pudding that fell into hell when a human ate him right before creating a girlfriend. Let's escape from hell with the power of your unrelenting anger.

name: Zelda3
description: An open-source reimplementation of The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past for the PC and other platforms. It requires an original ROM of the game to extract its assets, and has some enhancements like a widescreen support and higher framerate.

name: Sno Pokeler
description: Sin descripción

name: Finding Dory
description: Sin descripción

name: Prospero
description: Prospero was one of Valve's first game designs, slated to come out shortly after Half-Life.

name: Return to Ravenholm
description: Return to Ravenholm was the working title of a cancelled Half-Life 2 spin-off developed by Arkane Studios from 2006 to 2007. The player takes the returning role of the HECU marine Adrian Shephard from Half-Life: Opposing Force on a trip to the zombie-infested European town of Ravenholm. It was planned to take place after the events of Half-Life 2 but before the end of Half-Life 2: Episode Two. The concept of a Ravenholm-centered episode was inherited by Arkane after Junction Point Studios' own project was cancelled. Arkane's project was eventually cancelled by Valve as well much to the dismay of its developers, who were "extremely emotionally invested" in the project.

name: IMSA World Championship Racing
description: IMSA World Championship Racing is an unreleased sports prototype racing video game that was in development and planned to be published by Studio 3DO on a scheduled fall 1997 release date exclusively for the Panasonic M2. Had it been released before the launch of the console was cancelled, it would have become the first officially licensed title by the International Motor Sports Association and one of the first titles to be launched alongside the system.

name: UEFA 2001
description: A cancelled game in the Striker series. It would be released for the Dreamcast in 2001.

name: Hobo Brawl
description: Sin descripción

name: Dreadstone Keep
description: Dreadstone Keep is a roguelike, strategy turn-based game where you must defeat the two powerful entities that rule the ancient castle. Acquire upgrades, use your wits and battle powerful pixel art enemies!

name: The Bird That Drinks Tears
description: The Bird That Drinks Tears us is an action adventure game based on the novel series. The Bird That Drinks Tears, the best-selling series by Korean author Lee Yeongdo has enchanted millions of fans with its unique fantasy world. With fascinating characters, a carefully constructed plot, and poignant themes, it’s unsurprising they instantly fell in love with the books.

name: Porkchop's Horror Show
description:
"Welcome dear contestant, to the experience of a lifetime inside the reinforced walls of Porkchop's Horror Show! Where the brave and mentally unstable alike come to throw their lives away for the promise of money, prizes and fame. Survive the winding corridors of the haunted meat factory, where our mechanical-but-maniacal friend Porkchop will hunt you down and make you wish your death were as quick and painless as a simple jumpscare!"

"Unrepentant thrill-seeker! Face the many death traps laid out before you, each one more intricate and horrifying than the last, as each new episode ups the ante on the budget, the violence, the death, the scares, and the mysterious and convoluted story surrounding our titular living mascot character that keeps pulling our audience back for more with every new installment."

"Do you have what it takes to beat Porkchop’s Horror Show?"

name: Earthworm Jim Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Paintball Champs
description:
Load your paint gun, put on your camo and jump straight into the endless battle with the other shooting lovers, in this extremely entertaining multi-player version of Flick Champions Extreme Sport!
Meet the soldiers from around the world, challenge them, or master your skills alone and meet them again when the time is right.
Take your spare time to become an insuperable universal soldier and mark your path with hectolitres of sweat and paint, splashed everywhere on your online friends and enemies alike.
Run, crouch, take covers and do not let yourself be killed. Collect paint granades and use them once the atmosphere thickens. Collect power-ups and enter invincible mode to become the unstoppable ultimate paint throwing machine for a couple of seconds...

name: Raid Leader
description:
Encounter challenging boss fights. Collect gold and invest in dozens of unlockable abilities. Test your skills against the oncoming hordes of darkness.
Are you prepared?

name: SuperTrucks Offroad Racing
description: SuperTrucks Offroad Racing is an off-road racing game inspired by the top down racing games from the arcade era.

name: Flips!
description:
Jump on the trampoline and do as many flips as you can!
Easy to learn... hard to master.
Gain height by landing flip combos and collect boosts along the way. Just don't land on your head!
Earn gems to unlock characters with unique themes and physics.
How high can you go?

name: Highway Racer HD
description: Highway Racer is an amazingly fun game.

name: Hoverboard Hero
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Racer Evolution
description:
Bringing back the lost arcade feeling that racing games once had.
Select the Car, select the Track, enjoy the music and the sound of the engine's rpm rising, listen to the screeching tires when you drift, see the rubber on the asphalt, overtake your opponents, finish the race, earn your rewards and unlock the next Grand Prix.

name: Gem Phrase
description:
Play the classic game of guessing the phrase, combined with popular gem puzzle matching. Solve the phrase and earn in-game coins.
Start a game by choosing from Phrases, Movie Titles, Song Titles, Sports Teams, Space, Books, Places, Bible and History!

name: Rocky Towers: Puzzle Defense
description: Alright, so, no pressure but… without your help, the Light is doomed. The Void has been chasing us for the last few centuries, but the situation is dire. Only a few of us Ligthspawn remain, and we ask your help now! In order to evacuate the towers, we will need you to remove bricks to create a safe passage for the young Lightspawn. Defend them against the Void! Don’t worry, we’re here to help, take 4 of us heroes on the adventure and charge our special powers to delay the inevitable doom.

name: Deep Space
description: Deep Space is a scary survival game. The action takes place on a spaceship and you are the main character, who has to go through several obstacles to survive.

name: Space Arcade
description:
Space Arcade is STUNNING! Drive through space in a new remarkable way, filled with challenging space roads and beautiful 3D space environments.
Gather numerous space capsules as you possible can is the ultimate goal, however it won’t be easy as you could encounter an immense amount of enemies, which will do everything they can to destroy your spaceship.
Defense Towers, mines, fuel tanks and other obstacles will attempt to stop you from surviving. Your goal is to destroy them using advance missile technology equipped with all spaceships.

name: Guroku Rainbow
description:
Guroku Rainbow is the successor to the popular Guroku game, which is expanded with new types of stones, bringing even more gameplay possibilities and even more interesting puzzles to solve.
The player moves colored stones around the game grid, which determines the directions in which a stone can move at a given position. His goal is to get the individual stones to the target square of the same color. Each time the player moves a stone in a chosen direction, that stone does not stop moving until it hits another stone or arrives at a position on the game grid from which it is no longer allowed to move in that direction. This principle forces players to devise clever solutions, such as strategically placing other stones in such places that the moving stone stops where it is needed.
This unique game mechanic, which won the original Guroku so many fans around the world with its originality, is expanded in the new Guroku Rainbow with two new types of stones.

name: World Boxing Challenge
description: World Boxing Challenge puts pure iron in your hands, with the ultimate 3D, multi-device boxing experience. Train your boxers, grow your gym, and earn glory and money.

name: Rally Run
description: Rally Run is a fast-paced, single-touch racing game you can play on the go, with engaging racing, nitro-boosting and drifting mechanics - you won't have raced like this before!

name: Fox Runner Adventures
description:
Monsters appeared in the mysterious forest, which captured the crystals and prevent the inhabitants of the forest from living in peace.
You have to take on the task of cleaning the forest and preserve the crystals. This will help you to different characters with unique abilities.
Do not forget to improve the abilities of the characters, and you will win!
Good luck, the forest is on your side!

name: Forza Street: Tap to Race
description: Race through the ultimate street racing scene at dizzying speed with the tap of your finger! Have fun winning the racing car collection of your dreams. Pick an event, choose a lineup of cars from your collection, and start racing for infamy in the first Forza game for mobile.

name: Escape Mystery-The Dark Fence
description:
Escape from the Darkness, Be careful of the scary black shadows. Then find the ghost-lighted Pumpkins. You are ready to inventory secrets in the Panic Room and find the Hidden objects get out of the room escape.
All the 30 levels you feel different astonishment thrilling adventures in feel panic room compare to another play escape!

name: Fish Heroes
description: Meet Mr. Puffer, Mr. Whale, the quirky Octopus and other Fish Heroes who have set sail to save the smaller fish from being canned by the Shark Mafia! This 3D physics action-puzzler will test your skills, aim and logic in a mesmerizing ocean environment.

name: The Faceless
description: You have been thrown into an unknown territory, your task is to find and clear all enemies. As you progress through the game, you explore the abandoned buildings and industrial areas. Third Person Shooter. Explore the area and its buildings, collect ammo, protection and medical kits.

name: Cursor Story
description: Play as a cursor going on an adventure to retrieve it's lost memories. Play through small bullet-hell-ish levels and meet cool, interesting, weird and funny characters.

name: Strain
description: A horror game that aims to escape from a Japanese house where vengeful spirits live.

name: Tales of Terrabanthis
description: Single player Fantasy RPG that is a turn based game designed to have older games functions with modern graphics.

name: Real Zombie War Simulator
description: Destroy all zombies with sniper or other gun in this zombie game.

name: Mochiko-san Reunion!
description:
Mochiko-san Reunion! is an escape game by Na-ra and translated by Yamikaze.

A rundown mansion on the way to the mountains. A rumor has been circulating that a sobbing voice can be heard coming from there. Prompted by her classmates, Yui Kashima decides to go and find out what the voices are.

name: In Space
description: In Space is a 2D top-down Arena Shooter where you are on an alien planet, and you have to survive to a horde of alien creatures that want your blood

name: Bat N' Ball
description: Bat N' Ball VR: Challenge your batting skills against robotic pitchers and compete for the highest score in this fast-paced and realistic virtual reality baseball game.

name: Homeward
description: Homeward is a cozy and non-violent deckbuilding game that takes you on an epic journey through the ocean. You'll get to explore a vast and fantastic world peppered with various biomes and cultures from which you'll recruit new crewmates to help you take on a variety of exciting quests.

name: Steel
description: Build and expand your village, hone your combat skills, and explore a vast world filled with danger and opportunity.

name: Toast
description: "Toast" is a game where players must use problem-solving skills to escape a randomly generated maze while being chased by a deadly humanoid piece of toast. The game features challenging puzzles, randomly generated levels, and endless hours of excitement.

name: Treasure Trap
description: Pudi is an adventure lover who goes after the gold in the treasure map he got from a traveler. He now faces a dungeon of various challenges, the Color Dungeon! Will he finally be able to reach the gold he seeks or will everything be left with pain?

name: Redrum
description: Redrum, a 1v1 arcade party-game! Fight until the last second to win the cure and regain your lost humanity!

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Pro Train - Hamburg Flyer SVT 877
description: The Hamburg Flyer, a train consisting of two cars – each having a driver's cab and passenger cabin – was ordered by the Deutsche Reichsbahn-Gesellschaft in 1932 from Waggon- und Maschinenbau AG Goerlitz (WUMAG). The train was delivered in 1932 and put into service in 1933.

name: Move On
description: Move On is a Drama Visual Novel game where players can choose their own path. where we will play the role of the protagonist of the story In which the game presents the 5 emotional release of the human.

name: Generations
description: In this stone age survival game, you must use all your skills to survive in a harsh and unforgiving environment. From crafting tools and shelter, to hunting and gathering food, you will need to do whatever it takes to stay alive. With all these conditions to contend with, will you survive?

name: The Big One
description: Challenge your enemies by overcoming a simulation in perpetual construction. The Big One is an action/platform game of the "dungeon crawler" type, where your reflexes and concentration will be put to the test.

name: The Unknown
description: You and Your Team Of 4 Players Hunt down Paranormal Entities While Trying to Survive The Night Solving Paranormal Cases of the Unknown in this Online horror Multiplayer Game

name: Tank Rush
description: Tank based twin stick shooter action giving 4 player PVE coop fun, or enjoy a hectic PVP battle in various multiplayer modes.

name: Retro Wave Thunder
description: Take control of a hyper radical super-powered gunboat, and battle enemy drones through intense naval warfare! With stunning retro graphics, and chaotic enemy AI, this game will keep you on the edge of your seat! Prepare for waves of enemies, and unleash your thunder!

name: NoEL: Nothing on Elysion Line
description: Sin descripción

name: Aery VR: Calm Mind
description: Aery - Calm Mind is an interactive game experience that is designed to relax your mind and soul. Calm down from the hassle of your daily life, experience the feeling of flying, and immerse yourself into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes.

name: No Name Village
description: No Name Village is a top-down adventure game, set in a peaceful village that is at risk of being swallowed by the Black Sea. Follow our boy protagonist as he explores, fight off monsters, and uncovers the situation of the world around him.

name: ToD Fragments: Special Fun
description: The events of this mini-game revolve around the main character of the Threads of Destiny game and his acquaintance with a mysterious lady from a brothel.

name: Deep Sea Trip
description: Deep Sea Trip is a story of a deep water adventure. The deep sea has many natural dangers, but there are new dangers that threaten all deep sea and ocean life. A hero fish must save the day and figure out their way through the ocean and life.

name: ParaNormal Commute
description: (para)Normal Commute makes your everyday sardine-packed commute seem like a refreshing walk along a sunny beach... Solve puzzles and overcome challenges to complete your commute safely in this short first person puzzling journey!

name: FaceValue
description: Discover a new world on your journey as a living die. Relax by solving dice-based puzzles in this Isometric Zen Puzzler. Take your time, explore each level and find all the hidden secrets this world has to offer.

name: Dotgeon
description: Dotgeon is 2D action-adventure arcade game. Survive on an open map - collect resources, kill enemies and collect three columns from stone to go to the portal. Interesting mechanics of this world will not let you get bored.

name: Time and Time again
description: Build settlements, prospect and mine minerals, recruit units and wage wars to dominate your neighbors.

name: Paranormal Fear
description: Paranormal Fear is a 1-6 player online co-op ghost hunting game. Travel to locations to find and remove the evil spirit that resides there. not all the ghosts in these locations are evil, and some specialty ghosts will earn you extra cash if you are able to get a picture of them.

name: Wild Area
description: "Wild Area" is a game of survival and adventure while exploring wild areas. It is a rogue-like survival RPG game that produces production through gathering and hunting during the day, or goes on an adventure, and defends against zombies at night.

name: Hazatron
description: Hazatron is top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements. Heavy mech doomed to fight endless hordes of alien mechanoids.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: Midwestern Rails
description: Hills, forests, countryside - all to be expected in the Midwest. Operate long freights, stop at each station with Amtrak, or run locals and service the industries over this 420+ mile route. With over 71 industries to be serviced, you’ll be running trains for hours non-stop.

name: OutRune
description: A modern take on the traditional roguelike genre. Take one of the characters on a dangerous journey through the twisted towers and try to escape your captors. Face fierce and mutated bosses at the end of each floor and use the unique and efficient crafting system to increase your chances.

name: Docile Fright
description: Navigate cities and dungeons to find the source of the destructive phenomena.

name: Brain Cell
description: Brain Cell is a co-operative multiplayer adventure game. Play up to 4 players co-op to explore dungeons, complete puzzles, with twisting gravity physics. Explore huge worlds with friends. Work together to complete mind bending puzzles and defeat bosses.

name: Prisonfall
description: Prisonfall is arcade about escaping from a medieval prison. You are a prisoner in a prison with ghosts who used to keep order. It happened that you managed to get out of the shackles and now you can move freely throughout the prison. Can you go through all the tests and traps on the way to escape?

name: Rhythm Drive: Synthwave City
description: Drive around Synthwave City's open world while completing challenges to unlock new cars. Fully customize every detail of how your car drives or choose from a list of presets. Listen to synthwave, retro, vaporwave tracks and hit the notes to build your boost and pull off some impressive maneuvers!

name: Shatter
description: Join a wide group of characters as they travel across the world searching for answers, fighting a brutal autocracy, and chasing Esfal Psychi, a man of malevolent ambitions, in the first RPG title from uNIC Studios.

name: Goblin Party
description: Match the monsters in this retro style puzzler inspired by classic games.

name: R.H.
description: R.H. is a session-based online first person shooter. As a result of the division of the property of the former Russian Federation, territorial disputes arise between the newly formed states, some of which end in armed clashes that develop into a full-scale war.

name: Fell
description: In a beautiful word filled with secrets and exotic landscapes, a very chill creature is growing goblin spores in his garden. Then trains them to be sent off to war. Rogue-like dungeon adventuring meets gardening and exploration. Oh, and fishing!

name: Nightingale: Expanse
description: Take part in the wild and wonderful life of the Nightingale Universe! fight pirates and solve an ancient mystery!

name: Apocalypse Factory
description: Apocalypse Factory is an automation game with tower defense mechanics. You get production orders to fulfill while defending your production lines against zombies and gangs.

name: Super Skeleton Butler
description: As a skeleton butler, use your traps and magic to defeat hordes of do-gooder adventurers trying to steal your treasure in a tower defense/platformer mashup.

name: Four Hundred Catapults
description: City builder & Survival. When the dead get close enough, they can use the deadly fog to take control of your settlements. Build a strong economy to supply your warriors with long-range weapons and massive fortifications. This is the only chance to survive.

name: Inanima
description: Inanima Be part of something that will change the future of humanity.

name: Marble Ball: Racing 2022
description: Marble ball racing 2022 is a racing game. Player will control marble ball to race with other 30 AI marble ball in 57unique track. You can control ball with left and right arrow key or A and D key.

name: A Christmas Yarn
description: Welcome the holiday season with a cheerful match 3! Collect gold, gems and stars, and use it to decorate your Christmas tree! A Christmas Yarn features unique match 3 levels, jigsaws and a variety of mini games guaranteed to bring in Christmas cheer early!

name: Harmony Islands
description: Gather, craft and build your home on a randomly generated world made up of several islands. Explore the seas to find more islands with exciting unique items to bring back and use to craft. Build and supply a great ship to return home or stay on the island forever.

name: Planetary Strike
description: Planetary Strike is a chess-like competitive turn-based tactical strategy game where you assume the role of Commander. Guide your fleet of six unique ship types to victory by destroying the enemy’s planet while protecting your own.

name: Formula 2707: All Stars Kombat
description: Formula 2707 - All Stars Kombat is a combat driving simulator inspired by the great hits of the 2000s. It recreates the classic arcade game action and offers fun without speed limits. Formula 2707 offers a split-screen multiplayer mode for those who miss long couch nights with friends.

name: Shori Conquest
description: 7 Powerful Ancient Beasts have been Reawakened! Choose your hero, complete 10 challenging dungeons, find the Shori Stones, battle many strong foes, and put a stop to Purdrag’s plans!

name: Frack the World
description: Frack the World is a resource management game about successfully running a hydrofracking company while also dealing with the state of the environment.

name: Emprise
description: Emprise is an Adventure-RPG that changes everytime you play, based on your decisions

name: CarKour
description: A new experience in car-related games based on the principle of Parkour , as it focuses on driving and controlling skill to pass a map consisting of seven levels of difficulty !!!! .The real challenge begins at the fourth level :) ,so it was not mentioned in the demo or screenshots .

name: The flower of desire
description: In the fragmented world after the "Sin of Seven Day", watch from four perspectives how the people in this world fight against the almost irreversible disaster, confront the fate written for them by the world, reveal their hearts, show their heartfelt desires, watch them tell their stories

name: Cosmos Survivors
description: Cosmos Survivors is an action roguelite where you fight waves of spaceships and combine powerful skills to discover game breaking synergies. Unlock new ships, weapons, keepsakes and customize your talent tree to climb ascension levels. Choose your abilities wisely and you'll become a space god.

name: Aphotic
description: A retro textless Point'n Click.

name: Tower Alchemist: Defend Khaldoria
description: Defend the mystical kingdom of Khaldoria against invading enemies. Place your defense towers tactically smart to defend the king's lands. Prepare yourself for the cunning abilities of your enemies and achieve victory through your sophisticated strategy and precision.

name: Cosmic Overdrive
description: Cosmic Overdrive brings fast-paced rounds of a VR sci-fi runner that prioritizes comfort, immersion and engagement. Physically maneuver your spacecraft with interactive machinery. Fly cautiously to survive, but not so cautiously that the portal closes before you can make it through.

name: Solaro
description: Solaro is a handcrafted open-world game set in the remote outskirts of an ancient galaxy. Follow a lone traveller on an interstellar journey, solving puzzles, probing planets, and recovering lost fragments of the past.

name: Bank Tycoon
description: In a world where banks control countries, finances and armies, manage your bank and army to dominate the world. Based on actual banking principles, create relationships and strategies to manage finances and armies and lead your bank in turn-based grid game play

name: Village and the Witch
description: Jump into a farmtastic bewitched adventure and help your king to defend village from witch.The king will take the opportunity to explain basic task and give you feel of your first fright of Witch Attack. The king introduces you to the possibilities of interaction with the environment & villagers.

name: Seedless Light
description: Seedless Light is a 2d action-adventure game focused on combat and exploration with a unique and contemplative world of fantastic and vibrant creatures driven by a touching and atmospheric soundtrack.

name: Trouble In Space
description: A Sci-fi Shooter with Pixel-art graphics and various mechanics such as slow motion and dashing. In some levels you also get a special assistant.. You will enjoy this space shooter game. make sure you ALWAYS KILL THEM ALL.

name: Mushroom Collector Simulator
description: Mushroom Collector Simulator is a mushroom picking simulator that involves you in the hunt for many different mushrooms that grow in the wild. Collect mushrooms, enjoy walks through the forest, complete missions, upgrade your hut and equipment.

name: Tanks+: New Era
description: Pew pew pew! Its ww3? No it's just some tanks fun. Multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) video game with positive and dynamic battles 5x5 format.

name: Soccer Board
description: Soccer Board - is a turn-based board game. Football based game for one player. Move around the board, pass the ball, score goals and don't let your opponent take the ball. Play soccer on a board in this tactical movement game.

name: Sokoban
description: This is a leisure puzzle game.

name: Last Night on Actaeon
description: Can you survive the night? Your ship has crashed on the dark and hostile planet, Actaeon. You must use a variety of weapons, abilities and choose between game-changing upgrades to survive on a planet full of surprises.

name: Seas of Strife
description: In a world dominated by a vast uncaring sea, greedy pirates stalk the open water and fantastical kingdoms wage devastating wars for what little land exists. It's time for you to assemble your fleet, set sail and plunder, trade or conquer your way towards your destiny!

name: The Land of Babel
description: Build and nurture the universe of your dreams with Land of Babel; an expansive simulation city builder. Construct and manage powerful empires, establish intricate and detailed economies, explore unknown lands, embark on captivating quests, and much more.

name: Gninja Pig
description: Gninja Pig is a platformer 2D game with pixel art. A unique dose of cuteness with movements and attacks to take on challenges. Humans disappeared after a mysterious disaster, so you have to survive on your own but maybe you’ll find allies in your adventure.

name: For Honor: Black Prior Hero Skin
description: Become the master of fate with the Commander Ravier Hero Skin, a full-body customization of the Black Prior.

name: VR Pterosaur
description: This is a VR shooting leisure game. Players need to protect their eggs within the prescribed time and will not be destroyed by other dinosaurs.

name: Love n Dream 3
description: 《Love n Dream 3》is a match-3 puzzle game with dating elements. Your job is to complete all the missions and adventures around you to help all the girls on your journey.

name: Chivalrish
description: Chivalrish is a novella-sized, romance visual novel set in a medieval fantasy world. Set out on an adventure to rescue a princess who is not at all like you imagined her to be. Meet characters along the way, and decide your fate and theirs in this fun, comical, and thrilling journey.

name: Forest towers
description: Forest towers is a tower defense strategy in which you will have an exciting adventure.

name: Elsia War
description: The continent of Elsia, where the struggle continues, will end with you. SRPG game, use limited resources to enhance unit power and win. The story faces major choices from time to time, live and die of characters, but also affect the forces that start the war and the progress of the plot.

name: Chicken Coop
description: Chicken CoopThe hoomans are gone. The cow wants her pumpkin and the homestead is in need of your help!What animal will rise to feed the hungry cat and pet the dog?Chickens? With hats?Can they use the tools on the farm to save the day?Can they harvest the pumpkins to feed the cow?

name: Manhattan
description: Manhattan is a hybrid music editor and coding language combining MIDI sequencing with powerful procedural generation features. Designed for both newcomers and experts, and running as a plugin or standalone, Manhattan makes both music and coding more accessible and expressive than ever before.

name: Tickdown
description: You have two real-time hours to locate and defuse a weapon of mass destruction. Use the powers of Water, Earth, Fire, and Air to fight your way through hordes of enemies to reach your objective.

name: Marshrutka
description: Marshrutka - A side view game where the player drives a vehicle and dodges obstacles on the roads, collects coins and waiting passengers on the road, the goal of the game is to drive as far as possible and collect passengers in time, otherwise the level of orders will drop.

name: Shapes & Shots
description: Shapes & Shots is a Roguelite Shooter Bullet-hell, where you can control time as you make your way through a twisted and delusional universe. Your enemies will merge, creating infinite combinations to try to overwhelm you: only your skills, combined with upgrades you choose, can lead you to victory.

name: Path of Yuusha
description: "Path of Yuusha" is a simulation game set in the Yuusha academy with life sim elements of decorating your room freely and attempting events at local town. Experiencing the daily life of a school student who is busy with classes and work, Manages your weekly schedule to become a splendid hero.

name: Dark Box
description: You wake up on an island trying to remember your identity. The only thing you can do is: explore the island, and try to solve the puzzles one by one, leading to the ultimate truth.

name: Zombie Prison Break
description: This game has a fun aesthetic along with polished mechanics similar to AAA games. Every gun is something unique that you most likely haven't seen in other games. The prison/map has different path options giving good replayability.

name: Finsternis
description: Sin descripción

name: Time Titans VR
description: Time Titans VR is a Singleplayer action shooter that allows the user to manually slow down time to get an advantage in combat. Shoot, punch and slice through enemies while slowing down time to unleash mayhem or dodge counter attacks.

name: Cape of Storms
description: The main goal of "Cape of Storms" is to portray the horrors of sailing into the unknown. The fears and the insecurities of the Portuguese will take the form of monsters as they demonize the player.

name: Blacklight
description: A combo-oriented fighting game with a simple system. Players who are familiar with fighting games will be able to play right away thanks to its responsiveness and ease of understanding! Fly, run, solidify, and collapse!

name: Magic to Master: M2M
description: Magic to Master is a player-friendly, open-world far east MMORPG with unique combat system and a game world that sets no limits to the game experience. Become a part of the legendary action MMO! Show your skills to your enemies in epic PvM and take part in brutal Battleground PvP!

name: Demon Lord Tamer
description: You must evolve your own pet demon to destroy the world.

name: Antimatter
description: Antimatter is a sandbox strategy game, colonise planets, build your city on the surface or the underground. Build your spacestation or control your own spaceships to explore a huge and living galaxy !

name: Project Slime
description: In Project Slime: Outbreak, you'll battle against an army of infected slimes to save the world. Collect items, unlock special abilities, and upgrade your skills as you take on challenging bosses and explore a variety of environments. Can you emerge victorious in this fast-paced action game?

name: Dead Metal
description: 1-4 player co op roguelike with turn based combat and an emphasis on exploring randomly generated dungeons in order to find loot and complete missions

name: MotorCubs RC
description: MotorCubs RC is a savage offroad racing game set in a gorgeous rendition of Monument Valley. Single Player and Local Multiplayer using 4 classes of vehicles!

name: Withersworn
description: Unleash your powers as a Withersworn in this high action, high mobility, and high fantasy adventure.

name: PinCol
description: PinCol is an addictive Action 2D Space Shooter, a fast tactical Bullet Hell with Upgrade elements and Special abilities to obtain, the Color Damage Mechanics will drive you Crazy !!!

name: Castle Of Plague
description: Fight against different enemis in various chapter. Improve your charater's level and determine your best strategy with the money you earn by killing enemies. Will you use your money for a better weapon, or will you spend it for magic potions? Be ready and prepared for the boss!

name: Fantasy Tavern Simulator
description: Fantasy Tavern Simulator is a first-person 3D fast-paced simulator game. Serve beer, prepare food, furnish your tavern and take part in random events like brawls, royal feast or occult rituals. Make your guests feel welcome. Make your Tavern known!

name: BlueTricks
description: All five members of our team are majoring in game science and like to make games. Our team will grow into a company that can compete with 3N within 10 years, and we are working together to create games to create the new world of contents.

name: Dawn of Shadow
description: Evil lurks the realm! An ancient force is awakening from it's ashes. Dawn of Shadow set in a Low-Fantasy Medieval World. Choose your path and dive into a tale of epic fantasy in this action RPG title!

name: Orbital Bombardment
description: Orbital Bombardment is a unique space shooter game, with retro vibe and synthwave music. You orbit around planets and bombard the evil aliens to save the galaxy. Use different space ships with unique weapons to your tactical advantage to defeat the planetary defenses and to destroy the enemies.

name: Arcane Tower Defense
description: Build your own towers by choosing and combining randomized upgrades. Would you like an anti-air tower that leaves its targets with a burning effect? Lightning attacks that deal Splash damage and bounce from enemy to enemy? There are over 25 million possible combinations!

name: Outbreak 2030
description: 2030, The year Russia decided to end the war with a powerful weapon, as they claimed. Shortly after using that weapon, Russia went dark. Ceasing all communications and locking its border. That's when The U.S. sent a task force for infiltration and reconnaissance. To find out what went wrong.

name: Demonic Labyrinth
description: Demonic Labyrinth is an Action Roguelike with RPG elements. You find yourself in closed labyrinth littered with a pile of earth and stones. To get out, you have to clear your way and look for the right solution. labyrinth, fighting off a crowd of undead, which has long been waiting for a victim.

name: Kings Shire
description: Build your dream castle and defend it against invaders in this unique building game with complex economy, in which every good is simulated.

name: Amanda's Magic Book 5: Hansel and Gretel
description: Join Amanda’s new match-3 adventures in a remake of the popular fairy tale Hansel and Gretel. Help Amanda save her nephew Cedric from the wicked witch!

name: Fancy!
description: Fancy! is an exciting puzzle game with delicious, sweet candy combinations! In the game Fancy! You will find many bright and varied visuals and very beautiful music.

name: Escape The Escape Rooms
description: A mind twisting and puzzle filled horror escape simulator. Plan your escape to freedom by finding keys, completing puzzles and either work as a team or go for freedom on your own. But be warned you are not alone in there.

name: A Terrible Place
description: What seems like a simple mission turns into a fight for survival as the island wakes up to greet its new arrivals.

name: Welcome to Free Will: Episode 3
description: Welcome to Free Will - Episode 3 is the third episode of a choice-driven, adult Visual Novel game. You play as a young man who travels to a small town looking for his missing mother. As you soon find out, the town is packed with many beautiful women.

name: Striden
description: Loot, Build, Plunder and send the radio signal for freedom. Striden is the fast-paced, sandbox looter shooter survival game that you've never experienced before.

name: Moleshine Cooking Simulator
description: Moonshine? BORING! You will cook MOLESHINE! Grow ingredients in your garden, make moonshine and upgrade it with the main ingredient - a pesky mole that wants to eat your crop!

name: Stay in
description: This is a casual action horror FPS game with surprises and thrills and jumpscare. Utilize a wide variety of items and various actions to find the suitcase in the pitch-dark hotel where horrifying creatures roam.

name: Cornucopia
description: Puzzle platformer for the GBA, now on PC!

name: Night&Scape
description: Night&Scape is a cooperative board game for up to 4 players. Explore the world of dream, find dream's shard and escape ! The fate of this world is up to you.

name: Save Da Frogs
description: Save Da Frogs is an immersive, third-person, physics-based platforming adventure where you get to decide your very own Frog destiny. Hop your way through unique platforming stages and puzzles using physics-based controls.

name: Whispers of West Grove
description: A heart-pounding adventure taking place in the twisted town of West Grove. Play as a patient trapped in a world where dream and reality begin to blur. Use light to solve puzzles, reveal hidden items, and transform objects to explore in a way like never before.

name: Broken Note
description: A big world RPG adventure puzzle game that uses electric guitar and music elements to fight and solve puzzles, you need to find meaning and hope with your guitar in the dilapidated end world.

name: The kidnapped: Escape Room
description: You have been kidnapped and you find yourself trapped in an unknown house. In this escape room with a dark setting, you will have to solve different puzzles to get out of there. Will you be able to escape and survive?
